name: BRICKS DAG, Inc.
description: Developer and operator of a digital platform designed for building interactive apps. With visual dynamic presentation technology and code-free software and hardware data concatenation, the company's low-code/no-code platform develops digital display contents suitable for billboards, kiosk, self-service machine and other screen application, enabling designers to improve content development efficiency and convenience.
one_liner: Developer and operator of a digital platform designed for building interactive apps. With visual dynamic presentation technology and code-free software and hardware data concatenation, the company's low-code/no-code platform develops digital display contents suitable for billboards, kiosk, self-service machine and other screen application, enabling designers to improve content development efficiency and convenience.
